mapper.insert: insert into board(BOARD_NUM, SUBJECT, CONTENT, USER_ID, REG_DATE, CAT_ID, ref_g, re_step, re_level) values (board_num_seq.NEXTVAL, #{subject}, #{content}, #{user_id}, sysdate, #{cat_id}, #{ref_g}, #{re_step}, #{re_level})
mapper.update: update board set re_step = #{re_step}+1 where ref_g= #{ref_g} and re_step > #{re_step}
update board set readcount = readcount+1 where board_num=#{board_num}
update board set subject=#{subject}, content=#{content},cat_id=#{cat_id}, reg_date=sysdate where board_num=#{board_num}
mapper.select: select BOARD_NUM, SUBJECT, CONTENT, USER_ID, REG_DATE, REF_G, RE_STEP, RE_LEVEL, CAT_ID, READCOUNT , r from (select BOARD_NUM, SUBJECT, CONTENT, USER_ID, REG_DATE, REF_G, RE_STEP, RE_LEVEL, CAT_ID, READCOUNT , rownum r from (select BOARD_NUM, SUBJECT, CONTENT, USER_ID, REG_DATE, REF_G, RE_STEP, RE_LEVEL, CAT_ID, READCOUNT from board order by ref_g desc, re_step asc) order by ref_g desc, re_step asc) where r >= #{startRow} and r <= #{endRow}
